publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-468 Peter Peacock: Scotland's Contribution to Education in the Commonwealth - Past, Present and Futureâ€”That the Parliament welcomes to Edinburgh this month the 15th Conference of Commonwealth Education Ministers; recognises the contribution Scots have made, and continue to make, to education in the Commonwealth and more widely, and encourages the Scottish Executive to continue to work internationally to support educational development. Supported by: Euan Robson*
